```{r}
library(gapminder)
library(tibble)
library (DT)
library(ggplot2)
```

## A summary of the dataset
```{r}
summary(gapminder)
nrow(gapminder)
```


## A scatterplot of life expectancy by year

```{r}
ggplot(gapminder, aes(year, lifeExp, group=year))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  theme_classic()
```

## Linear regression for life expectancy as a function of year
```{r}
lm.lifeexpec <- lm(lifeExp~year, gapminder)
summary(lm.lifeexpec)
```
